确认重置业务通用选项？: Are you sure to reset business setting?
该操作将会把业务通用选项内容重置为最后一次保存的状态，请谨慎操作！: This will reset all the content of the business setting to the state of last saved.
请输入正确的业务名称: Please enter an existed business name
快照存储的业务名需要和 GSE 的数据写入配置保持一致，修改后需要重启 data: The business name of the snapshot storage needs to be consistent with the data writing configuration of GSE, and the datacollection service needs to be restarted after modification, otherwise CMDB will not be able to consume the host snapshot data normally.
外 BG 导入主机要执行的流程: The process when host(s) import from business portal
确认重置平台信息选项？: Are you sure to reset platform info.?
该操作将会把平台信息选项内容重置为最后一次保存的状态，请谨慎操作！: This will reset all the content of the platform info. to the state of last saved.
重置将会把所有选项内容恢复至初始化状态，不可恢复，请谨慎操作。: This action will reset all options to the initial state, please operate with caution!
支持日期变量，{{current_year}} 为当前年份，{{current_: You can use variables like: {{current_year}} / {{current_month}} / {{current_day}} to dynamically update datetime
确认重置所有校验规则？: Are you sure to reset all rules?
该操作将会把所有的校验规则内容重置为最后一次保存的状态，请谨慎操作！: This will reset all the content of the verification rule to the state of last saved.
确认删除模块？: Are you sure to delete it ?
确认修改集群？: Are you sure to edit it ?
确认修改模块？: Are you sure to edit it ?
确认新增模块？: re you sure to add a new module ?
保存后将会立即生效，请谨慎操作！: It will take effect immediately after saving, please make sure the config is correct!
